name: Music_4830.wav
keywords: ['guitar lesson', 'male voice', 'instructive speaking', 'electric guitar', 'clean sound', 'gentle playing', 'mellow']
caption: This is the recording of a guitar lesson video. There is a male speaking in an instructive manner, giving the name of the chord he is about to play next. The chords are being played gently on a clean sounding electric guitar. There is a mellow feel to the sound. Parts of this recording can be sampled for use in beat-making.
